Entries.spring_14: Maybe Mom will buy some chocolate now that it's on sale?$h
Entries.summer_Wed10: I asked Sam if he'd teach me how to skateboard some day.#$b#He said I was too little.$s
Entries.Thu8: Sam let me play one of his video games!$h#$e#Mom yelled at him over that, though.
Entries.IslandSouth_Entry: Do I need to put on sunscreen?

Entries.summer_Mon8: Mom made stewed spinach yesterday. Yuck.$s
Entries.summer_Tue8: I wonder if I can get Sam to buy me an ice cream...
Entries.1: I miss daddy. I hope he's alright over there.
Entries.4{{YearRemainder}}: I don't wanna go to school.$s#$b#You think I could pretend to be sick?
Entries.18{{YearRemainder}}: Mom let us have pizza yesterday!$h
Entries.19{{YearRemainder}}: Mom bought us some grapes! Here, have one![398]$h#$b#Grapes are my favorite!
Entries.20{{YearRemainder}}: Miss Penny was teaching me my times tables!#$b#She says adults use these all the time. {{Title}} @, do you use times tables?
Entries.22{{YearRemainder}}: Mom and Dad dragged us out to the city yesterday.#$b#Only good thing was that I got to have {{i18n: dishes.dessert.{{Random:01,02,03,04,05,06,07,08,09}} }}.

Entries.10_2: Mom let me have french fries!$h

Entries.2_2: Look, @, at this pretty feather I've found![444]
Entries.3_2: @, why do giraffes have such long necks?
Entries.5_2: Miss Penny is trying to teach us about the water cycle. {{Title}} @, what is the water cycle?
Entries.6_2: I wanna go fishing too!#$e#{{Title}} @, do you think Sam will take me fishing?
Entries.7_2: Do you think I can get Dad to take me to the Zuzu City Aquarium?
Entries.8_2: Mom and Dad went to the city for a day. Said it was something for Dad.#$b#They said it might help bring Dad back? But he's back?
Entries.9_2: I hope Mom's making {{i18n: dishes.child.{{Random:01,02,03,04,05,06,07,08,09}} }} for dinner tonight.
